mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mail_template (temp_name, service_id, mail_to, mail_cc, mail_subject, mail_content) VALUES (#{tempName}, #{serviceId}, #{mailTo}, #{mailCc}, #{mailSubject}, #{mailContent} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE mail_to = values(mail_to), mail_cc = values(mail_cc), mail_subject = values(mail_subject), mail_content = values(mail_content)
mapper.select:
SELECT t.temp_id, t.temp_name, t.service_id, s.service_name, t.mail_to, t.mail_cc, t.mail_subject, t.mail_content, t.mail_group, t.mail_timer FROM mail_template t JOIN db_service s WHERE t.service_id = s.id
AND t.service_id = #{_parameter}

SELECT * FROM mail_template t WHERE
t.temp_id = #{_parameter}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mail_send_history ( mail_to, mail_cc, mail_subject, sender_ip_address, send_time) VALUES ( #{mailTo}, #{mailCc}, #{mailSubject}, #{ipAddress}, #{sendTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT dso.id serviceId, dso.service_name serviceName FROM db_service dso ORDER BY dso.service_name
